lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Everyone is capable of achieving their dreams. I want to help make those dreams possible.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to students in Japan.

lender.name: Arnab
lender.loan_because: Pink Martini is a great band...

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I care. To invest such a little amount of money to make a huge difference in someones life. How could I refuse? I am lucky that I am able to feed my children, send them to school and buy them the things they need... and want. I want to be part of the solution. Pay It Forward!
lender.occupational_info: Single mother of 2.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Public Health Nurse.

lender.name: Alex Rodriguez
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in the entrepreneurial spirit within every human. It is my desire to help ignite the entrepreneurial spirit within all of us, throughout the world.

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: I like to see other people get a hand UP!
lender.occupational_info: I drive for a living. I am self-employed and deliver pharmaceuticals to pharmacies and other routes.

lender.name: Theresa & Allen
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate.

lender.name: Nick & Kristen
lender.loan_because: God's given us enough. We think he wants other people to have some too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people when they need help fast and my wife watches children so other people can work.

lender.name: Jon & Karen
lender.loan_because: WE are so blessed, we should help those desiring to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: CFO for hi-tech and complex manufacturing companies.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: It is an oppurtunity for me to not only see the world, but to share what i have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell fragranced soy candles

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I'm in business for myself and understand the need for help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in construction, hauling materials to different job sites.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: The choices you make have direct impact on your life and the life of others. I choose to make a choice that will have a positive impact on the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: My first job is taking care of the needs of my family. I also have a business that teaches people how to eat properly and stay healthy.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I live in a country with so much of everything. KIVA allows me to help people with so little that my small donations can make a real difference.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Build community
lender.occupational_info: I teach math, video production, and robotics to students that are deaf. Ense√±o matematica, producion de video y robotica a los estudiantes sordos.

lender.name: Vivienne
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm lucky. I get paid to make up stories.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about moms/families having the chance to provide for their kids' needs all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I love being a mom and am thankful for each hour of each day I get to share with my kids!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I appreciate people who make the effort to create a better life for themselves and their family. I want to do my part to help.
lender.occupational_info: I fit people with prescription eyeglasses so that they can see better.

lender.name: Diana Saville
lender.loan_because: I support microfinance!
lender.occupational_info: I create short movies about scientific phenomena

lender.name: Dan & Tavish
lender.loan_because: It brings us great joy to help others follow their dreams! We hope that by giving to others around the world who do not have the opportunities we have here in the United States, we will inspire others to do the same!

lender.name: Kevin and Michele
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are blessed to live in a country where safety and abundance is taken for granted. This, unfortunately, is not the case for the vast majority of the world's population. It is our hope that with whatever small financial support we can offer, people who have lived without can start to live with the security and dignity every person deserves. I applaud the work that Kiva is doing.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical consulting to architects and designers for a variety of materials that are used in the construction industry. I also work with Former U.S. Vice President Al Gore's non profit organization The Climate Project to promote awareness of the looming crisis of global warming. I provide a free version of the same slideshow that was featured in the documentary, "An Inconvenient Truth" to various groups and organizations in my community.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's good karma, and because life is tough enough, and I like to help people when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people to be responsible designers, to create products, places, spaces, and systems for a better future -- not just for those that can afford it, but for everyone.

lender.name: NORI
lender.loan_because: I would really like to contribute to supporting for the persons with strong intention to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info:
Now, I am a graduate student in Adelaide, Austrlaia, getting the 2-year leave from my office.
My major is Asian Studies.

lender.name: Maria
lender.occupational_info: I assist customers with storage need for personal or for business use. Renting a storage space is very similar to renting an apartment on a monthly basis. Customer use it to store their belongings and use it as long as they need it and pay rent on it every month for as long as they need it.

lender.name: Philip Stanek
lender.loan_because: It works

lender.name: MARIKO
lender.loan_because: I know I can't save everyone but I have a chance to ..........

lender.name: Ben and Kelle
lender.loan_because: its all God's.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I am g iving a loan as this is just one additional facet to my quest to help others.

lender.name: Parrish
lender.loan_because: I think women are extraordinary. Their strength of Spirit, loyalty and dedication to their families is never ending. This is my way of helping some of those remarkable women realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I try to capture the light and beauty in this world.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fulfill their dreams and provide a better life for themselves, their families and communities.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I truly care for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help nurses take care of stroke victims.

lender.name: Vanalee
lender.occupation: Looking for the good in the world
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper!

lender.name: Hiroko
lender.loan_because: I want to share my happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothes&sell it in Japan. But I live in Hong Kong because my husband is Chinese.

lender.name: Asja
lender.occupational_info: i work with people with physical and intellectual disabilities , giving them all the love i can, supporting their potentials and believing in their beauty

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of primary age children and an author of educational books for kids and teachers.

lender.name: maichoice
lender.loan_because: success happens when others believe in you and want you to WIN. Since that opportunity was given to me, it is my turn to create a WIN-WIN situation...
lender.occupational_info:
Career: "CLEAN" teeth--for a healthy mouth through good oral hygiene is one step closer to living and eating well with a happier smile ; )
Character: Real with a GOOFY appeal, caring about sharing, & loud yet proud--hahaha

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It feeds my spirit
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who have a child or children with a mental health illness.

lender.name: Abilio
lender.loan_because: I love making a difference to entrepreneurs in the third world!

lender.name: yucel
lender.loan_because: iwanto make happy for my regionals people
lender.occupational_info: im seaman but iwanto go NLP and Hypnose course,but iwanto teach to myzones people for education

lender.name: Jerome
lender.whereabouts: Le Coudray Macouard Maine et Loire
lender.loan_because: I believe helping entrepreneurs is a way of positively helping an entire community or family. I also believe that it is best to help people work close to their families instead of having them sacrifice their happiness to support their families back home by working abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Finance of a Luxury Resort in a remote island in the Indian Ocean.

lender.name: Shinji
lender.loan_because: just for global peace.

lender.name: Ceil
lender.loan_because: I was raised with the belief that people are responsible to share what they have with those less fortunate than themselves. Learning what others want to accomplish with so little makes me more appreciative of all the non-essential things I have.
lender.occupational_info: I started as a line police officer working on horseback, was promoted to sergeant & worked in a cruiser(car) supervising field personnel, was promoted to Lieutenant & was responsible for an entire work group in field operations. I supervised the communications unit, evidence management & uniform procurement, managed the Mounted Unit.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I believe in the prospects of what Kiva is doing.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in Information Technology for 20+ years. I am now studying full time at the University of Tasmania towards a Bachelor of Tourism with a Photography major. My short term plan is to graduate from University and base myself in China for 6 to 12 months, where I'll teach English and write travel stories.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to reduce poverty. And with luck may a lot of little rain drops eventually become an ocean :)

lender.name: John Michael
lender.loan_because: i want to help

lender.name: Rick, Leesa & Mason
lender.loan_because: Microlending is a powerful tool to accelerate growth in developing countries. Lending small amounts to fledgling entrepreneurs helps the local economy in ways that traditional aid does not.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company make long-range decisions that will allow them to grow and continue to be profitable.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: Would like to help people achieve their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I drive trains in the Melbourne suburban area.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have no money for clothing or food, and to go hungry. If someone has a good idea that will improve their life, I want to help them. It only takes a little bit to help another person, and sometimes the most helpful thing is knowing that other people believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical clinic, helping the manager with office things - ordering paper, taking notes at meetings, using the computer.

lender.name: Kieran Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and I want more company along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about how to live with and appreciate wildlife and nature.

lender.name: Joshua/Maurie
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed with more than we need.
lender.occupational_info: i work for 24 hours at at time responding to extinguish fires and other emergencies.

lender.name: Celia & Cesar
lender.loan_because: We want to help others reach their goals. We all have to realize it is not all about us.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find their need for insurance, being auto, life, health etc. My main goal is life insurance. When the bread-winner of the family dies, the spouse and children are left with nothing. I help them see that without them, their family may not have a home or even a meal for tomorrow.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am able to hopfully make a small difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to high school students.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: to help others
lender.occupational_info: accountant

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer that works currently at a company that sells clothes and home decorations. My job to create new systems that improve the business and also the deploy those systems across North America, Europe and Asia

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I know the money is appreciated and being used constructively since it has to pay back.

lender.name: Ryan & Jan
lender.loan_because: We want to help break the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info:
We own our own software company for making personalized party favors
Our own Social Networking Site and other online things.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others on the path to independence and a better life.

lender.name: LaQuita & Dave
lender.loan_because: We loan because we desire to be a part of a world who reaches out to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We sell used books online and program computers using RPG, Cobal and Cold Fusion.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager of a customer service call centre for collectibles.

lender.name: Erryl and Betsy
lender.loan_because: We think that helping someone develop a business is better than charity, because the benefit is more lasting. We also see women disadvantaged in many parts of the world and think that helping them develop a business will liberate them.
lender.occupational_info: We don't work every day any longer and have time to think about how we can help others that still do.

lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: sharing the wealth we (the US) have is a great source of joy & fulfillment for me & I like the sense of accountability about the interest free loan & repayment approach.
lender.occupational_info: Founded a 501c3 for spreading Life Coaching in orgs;Currently a Life & Executive Coach, & retired Corporate Exec from the restaurant industry

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help individuals in need from all over the world to help them get a new start on life.

lender.name: Kevin & Robin Fitzgerald
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell machines that business people use to share information.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I believe in programs which work with individuals.
lender.occupational_info: After retirement in 1993, I have assisted in developing substance abuse prevention programs in Lithuanian, Poland, Belarus, and Turkey.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I saw the Oprah episode with Bill Clinton and the segment about Kiva was so moving that I just had to check it out. As a women who's scared to take that first step in owning my own business, I hope that my donation will help someone realize their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I've been a hairdresser for 16 years and absolutely love my job. I feel so lucky to do what I do, helping people feel good about themselves and sometimes just being a shoulder to cry on or a cheerleader, it makes me feel good to know that what I do has a positive effect.

lender.name: Ophelia
lender.loan_because: it's my obligation as a citizen of the world to help in some way -

lender.name: Cherlyn
lender.loan_because: Its nice to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help medium and big businesses better understand their information technology operations.

lender.name: Erika & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We saw this on Oprah. Either way you slice it, it's a win win situation!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: This is a tangible way to show and share the love of Christ.
lender.occupational_info: Tim manages scientific information for a government agency.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: to enable someone to put their stamp on the world

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: God is AWESOME! Loving everyone is what makes us a world of people; and this is yet another way I can say, "Thank you Lord." ...
lender.occupational_info: I manager an apartment community of 407 apartment homes, providing customer service to over 1500 residents.

lender.name: Paul & Pam
lender.loan_because: Because we want to give back something for all that God has provided us.
lender.occupational_info:
Paul directs the management of all government owned vehicles used by the employees of the State of North Dakota, USA
Pam listens to doctor summaries of patient visits and types it on a computer for permanent record keeping.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people become self sufficient and create a way to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a management position for the US Government. It is very rewarding work

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Much of what I do is based on acting locally and thinking globally. But once in a while, I think it is important to look at the big picture too, and Kiva satisfied a desire I have had for some time to help others, even outside my immediate realm of control. I can do without that extra icecream cone, piece of pizza or CD album. Joining Kiva is also an expresssion of my spirituality in the sense of Buddhist "right action".
lender.occupational_info: I have a dual careers... one in the health care technology as a software developer, and another as a composer/performer. In both of those areas, technology has changed how we live and work. I like Kiva because it is another example of a great idea that really can change the world.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference by helping someone reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of early childhood students, ages 4-6.

lender.name: Narma Family
lender.loan_because: it seems natural to help those who are willing to put in the effort to help themselves.

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to fulfill their dreams regardless of location or personal circumstances.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling that it gives to help someone out that really needs it. I love being able to help change someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: My work consist of working in a doctor's office, I got into this kind of work because I wanted to be able to help someone that really needs someone to help them get through their situation, such as a illness.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have recently come to America.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.occupation: full time grandma, part time sales
lender.loan_because: I have been given many opportunities, its just my turn to give back.
lender.occupational_info: love my grandchildren as much as possible and be a good example. be enthusiastic about our product.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I support companies with the "human" side of business.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I was one of the many people who saw on Oprah what one person can do to make a difference in someone else's life. Someone who just needs a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Newborn Intensive Care, taking care of premature and sick newborn babies.

lender.name: Brolin
lender.loan_because: I saw this site on Oprah and it seemed like a really nice and unique idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at college studying television broadcast, which is everything that is involved in the production of television shows.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare, nursing.

lender.name: Silent G
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them better understand their customers, markets, and competitors so that they can develop and market effective products and services.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Just a little effort from us can make a huge difference for somebody else

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and improve their lives.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It feels like a gift to myself.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: The same reason everybody here does -once you realize it takes so little to change a life it's pretty hard not to lend.
lender.occupational_info: Our company promotes and sells travel around the world

lender.name: Bruno
lender.loan_because: I think It's important to help people
lender.occupational_info: Giving love through my photos !

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: To see a world in a grain of sand, And a heaven in a wild flower, Hold infinity in the palm of your hand, And eternity in an hour - William Blake You can make a difference in someones life and future.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a charitable foundation that makes grants to strengthen communities.

lender.name: Son
lender.loan_because: I believe very strongly in philanthropy. It's bigger than me and you.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: This is the way I can express my awe at those who work so hard to change the lives of themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with large business leaders helping them figure out the best way to manage and develop their employees

lender.name: krista
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself and I know how difficult it is to get your own business up and running. I want to "pay forward" the generosity that was given to me to start my own business. I have the upmost respect for each and every individual who has the ambition to make their own path in life by starting their own business.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I help small to medium sized companies build their business by creating logos, websites and marketing materials to promote their company and products.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I feel this is the best way to help others be succesful. The succes will be longer lasting and more impactful if they can create opportunities for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help develop oil and gas in a responsible so we can continue the growth and betterment of the world

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I like empowering people to improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Account Development for a Print Solutions Company

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone who needs a helping hand. God has been very generous to me and my husband and I feel it my honor and privilege to "Pay it Forward".
lender.occupational_info: I teach people of all ages about the nature and wildlife of Michigan, USA. Through guided nature hikes and live animal programs, I try to get the general public to care about our planet, its natural resources, and the diversity of habitats. Working together, we can make a difference in the one home we all share - planet Earth.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Just as you excel in everything-in faith,in speech,in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us,see that you also exceed in this grace of giving- 2 Cor 8:7

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: Just as you excel in everything-in faith,in speech,in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us,see that you also exceed in this grace of giving- 2 Cor 8:7
lender.occupational_info: Prepare, Compound and Dispense medication to patients. Counsel them on the diseases and the medications to treat.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It makes a person able to help themselves. There is pride and dignity in helping yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I know the rewards of being able to take care of my expenses in life. My business allows me to do that. I want to help someone else know success... so they can in turn help others.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: As a struggling small business owner I know how hard it can be. And as hard as it can be here, it must be immensely difficult in other places in the world. Compared to most, we have a lot, a home, cars, TV, and security. But mostly I give because my parents raised me with the sense of obligation to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to create art for businesses. Things like logos, business cards, menus, and flyers. I try and make companies look good. I also design websites, and some database management.

lender.name: Michelle & Two Guys
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good. Like Oprah and Mr. Clinton said giving is a selfish act. This is one time that I do not mind being selfish.
lender.occupational_info: Some think I am crazy because I teach middle school (ages 12-13).

lender.name: Miskeeto
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is a brilliant way to help citizens from all over the world reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out how products need to work so that people can use them effectively.

lender.name: Moritz
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can make big changes for others less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I develop different type of parts and tools for robots which are used in the bodywork construction - mainly for the big european car producers

lender.name: Katlin
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children in the city, helping them develop a positive self-concept, and the social/emotional skills they will need to mature, and succeed in school. I also work with their families helping parents understand the developmental stages of childhood and helping them find ways to guide and discipline their children without violence.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Everyone around the world deserves a chance to create a better life for themselves and for their families through hard work!

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: This makes so much sense.
lender.occupational_info: I support the manufacture of biotherapeutic medicines

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I feel extremely fortunate and grateful to be a US citizen and feel much joy in helping others fulfill a dream or opportunity that will better themselves and/or their community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales assistant in a company that sells camping memberships to our camping/RV parks nationwide.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I care about people.

lender.name: Billie Jo
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping people 'get started' on a new path to being self sufficient and successful!
lender.occupational_info: Distributor of Commercial Furnishings and Commercial Interor Design

lender.name: Trevor and Cara
lender.loan_because: Wedding gift

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do, and everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: The Today Show did a segment on KIva, and it sounded like such a wonderful idea that I just had to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I administer cases under the bankruptcy law, which helps people who have gotten into trouble by owing more money than they can pay.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am compelled to give.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adolescent students who have disabilities.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: Today I am looking for my own enterpreneur opportunity and one day my dream will come true. And I may be in need and would want someone to assist me also beause they believe in my dream too.

lender.name: Aaron Lemur Mintz
lender.loan_because: A little bit of money in a bank is less useful than helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I was a programmer - now I'm heading back to law school. Hoping to do some variant of privacy.

lender.name: Mike & Tiffany
lender.loan_because: We're blessed with the ability to do so.

lender.name: Tina & Team Sensation!
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
My work involves coaching others to succeed in their home based businesses in Canada. Kiva helps me to do this elsewhere in a way I could not on my own.
I appreciate that so many support my business, and together we are able to contribute to KIVA to help others.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I am grateful.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner myself and like the opportunities that lending through kiva can create for others. I think this is a beautiful way of connecting people together and believe that it is important for us to help each other improve our own lives and the lives of those around us.
lender.occupational_info: I use Traditional Chinese Medicine as a way of helping people improve their health and bring balance into their lives.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nilo
lender.loan_because: I was given a chance & want others to have the same chance.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a Law Firm with 20 employees. I am the come to person for many tasks.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help those not born into opportunities like I've had and inspire others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am in the process of moving to Ireland for a year, where I will be working and traveling Europe. I am a writer and a musician.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i worked very hard all my life. as you are i am sure. i have the good furtune to live in a country that has opportunity. it discourages me to see young people in my country taking so much for granted. and then see how hard it is for others in undeveloped society's. i hope my little contribution helps.

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: along my life journey, a village embraced me and i want to be a part of the village that embraces others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the United States Postal Service.

lender.name: Larry & Linda
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and want to see others prosper.

lender.name: Eveline
lender.loan_because: I would like to give.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate and work as a supervisor in a bank.

lender.name: Sandra & Kenny
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Tatiana
lender.loan_because: It is a way to assist others in achieving their full potential as independently financial individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary teacher. I teach Grade 1.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Everybody has a story.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a dental receptionist..I love working with the patients:)

lender.name: Mary and Howard
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of impacting someone directly! Choosing the person brings life to our gift !!
lender.occupational_info: Mary helps children at school. Howard leads a team of workers who develop computer software.

lender.name: DEBBIE
lender.loan_because: THE WORLD HAS MANY PLACES THAT ARE NOT AS LUCKY AS WE ARE IN AMERICA. WE ARE BLESSED TO BE ABLE TO GIVE. TO START SOMEONE IN A JOB TO HELP OUT HIS OR HER FAMILY IN A AREA WHICH NEEDS HELP MAKES MY HEART LARGER THAN LIFE. TO GIVE IS TO RECIEVE,
lender.occupational_info: I BECAME DISABLED IN 2000 AFTER WORKING 30 YEARS AS A CARDIOVASCULAR TECHNOLGIST. THIS JOB IS DOING TESTING ON PEOPLES HEARTS TO SEE IF THEY NEED MEDICINE OR SURGERY OR IF THERE HEART IS DOING WELL AT THE TIME OF TESTING. I LOVED MY JOB AND WAS SAD I COULD NOT WORK ANY LONGER. NOW MY TIME IS SPENT WATCHING MY GRANDAUGHTER WHO WAS BORN IN NOV 2006. IT IS A BLESSING FROM GOD TO BE ABLE TO CARE FOR HER.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can afford to buy a new cooktop although the old one still works, so I can afford to help lift others out of the poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I help young people learn to think.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to share with others around the world who need a helping hand. "A giver is always blessed by giving."
lender.occupational_info: I am a school teacher of severely handicapped children who are 3, 4 and 5 years old.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: God blesses us, so we can pay it forward, to people who are struggling.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, and work in a large hospital, taking care of premature babies in an intensive care unit.

lender.name: Valena
lender.loan_because: It is an awesome way to give back no matter your personal finances!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I strive to teach my daughter every day that helping others is the most important thing we can do in the world.

lender.name: Laurie & Todd
lender.loan_because: I love helping those who are willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: I believe every person can make a difference and little by little, we can change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I'm graduating from college and am unsure of what I can do for my life's work.

lender.name: julius
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of Tikun Olam or our obligation to repair the world one deed at a time.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in our global community. I want to do everything I can to help those in poverty get on track to financial succes. We are all global citizens and need to support each other.
lender.occupational_info: I lead strategic programs dealing with the latest in technology.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I know how extremely important these micro loans are. They give hope. They strengthen the community. They break the cycle of poverty. Bravo Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a sales force which sells $100 million worth of technology equipment annually. I also write about private schools for About.com, a New York Times company. And I am a volunteer announcer at WCPE, The Classical Station. (http://wcpe.org)

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I teach third grade in a small town in Michigan.

lender.name: Tuan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I do anything with networks and computers.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can. It's an affordable way to make a positive impact on other people's lives.

lender.name: Pfenninger
lender.loan_because: I can and if everyone did just a little the world would be a better place

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Since we are all One World now, we all have a responsibility to help each other make it a better one.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from a large rehabilitation agency, where I most recently managed services for people with developmental disabilities & their families.

lender.name: Michelle & Cliff
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of giving others an opportunity to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I think raising the next generation is one of the most important jobs in the world!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: We all need to believe in ourselves. I was a single mom who wanted to make life better for my girls, so they would not have to struggle as I did, others believed in me. Pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: Help people solve their problems.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out to others around the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a freshman at a Christian college prep school in Lexington, Massachusetts.

lender.name: L&D
lender.loan_because: "You may give a piece of bread to a hungry person, and when the cravings of hunger return some one else must administer to his wants again; to put that person in a position to earn his own subsistence is true charity; in this way you direct his feet in the path of true independence, he is then only dependent on his own exertions and on the blessings of his God." ..............................Daniel H. Wells (1814 - 1891)

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: a very small loan creates such a disproportional benefit to small businesses

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because:
"Life's most persistent and urgent question is, What are you doing for others?'" - Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

I want to help those who want to better their lives for themselves and their families, especially those in Latin America and Mexico. Having lived in Mexico, I have a better understanding of some of the financial issues that people are faced with and I want to do what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Marketing, selling and promoting events and educational information to bankers. I also teach English to Spanish speakers and translate as a volunteer for Kiva!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I study economics and international business.

lender.name: Pamelli
lender.occupational_info: I track UFO's with my homemade UFO tracker machine.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: i support women in their efforts to make a better life
lender.occupational_info: i help people who are dying, and their families, through this passage

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: I feel like its our responsibility to help others. This past year, I've been blessed and I think this website is an incredible way to give!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a special needs teaching assistant, training students job skills and helping them transition to the community from high school.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to live in Canada.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to succeed.

lender.name: Augusto
lender.loan_because: I llike that I can contribute and directly help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for the internet.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do the right thing.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think it makes the whole world better
lender.occupational_info: I design robots.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: The power of giving can do wonders. I am humbled and honored to use Kiva to help reduce poverty.

lender.name: byung chul
lender.loan_because: It's good job!

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it is remarkable what a difference we all can make.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment industry.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is a good thing. Happy to have this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I design print materials and web sites.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of women in countries that they have to struggle so much on a day by day basis. I am a "host mother" to a wonderful young man from the Congo that came to this country to attend Davidson College in NC and he has changed my life and made me so much more aware of how fortunate I am because I live in the US.
lender.occupational_info: Working for a small start-up company that puts up exterior decorative grille work on commerical buidlings.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: We all have dreams, and who wouldn't like a little help towards one?

lender.name: Lourdes
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my family. I used to work as a speech therapist. I helped improve the speech of people who had had strokes, head injuries as well as children with develpmental difficulties.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of small scale face-to-face contact between peoples...that our small contribution can make a huge impact on someone's life...that the loan can have a ripple effect as the money gets loaned over and over..that it's a loan and not charity
lender.occupational_info: I try, in my own small way, to make an impact on people's lives one person at a time.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I've traveled the world extensively and have seen so much need. I know a little can mean a lot to someone who wants to make their life better.

lender.name: Sooze
lender.loan_because: It's important to support the contributions people are making to seek change within their lives and the lives of people in their communities
lender.occupational_info: I work in an environment that fosters peace and allows people to take time to pause. I am happy serving clients and making their lives less stressful

lender.name: Dominic & Sooze
lender.loan_because: It is our desire to foster the entrepreneurial spirit of people in developing countries. We who have more should give to those whom have less.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: we all need help from each other.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 2nd grade children in Brooklyn, New York City. They are 7 and 8 years old. I teach them about reading, writing, math, history, science, and caring for each other.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world. I am a mother and a teacher and I am grateful to have so much abundance in my own life, I hope to help others reach their hopes, dreams, and life goals too.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about urban environmental issues.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of talented software professionals

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: It's my way of doing a lot of good with a little. It makes me feel connected to the effort of making the world a better place one person at a time.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty as a human being to help those less fortunate to make a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I assess and evaluate youngsters with learning disabilities

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people who work so hard to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math at the local high school near my house.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I havent loaned yet,but I feel that all people should help each other out.If you have give,if you cant tell others.
lender.occupational_info: My family owns a Ice Cream Truck its the kind you drive up & doen streets with music,I also work as a cashier & do home health,and I am a single MOM.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.....and embrace diversity
lender.occupational_info: I assist Loan Officers at Mortgage Broker Companies, in and around Chicago, obtain financing for their cleints who are obtaining residential home loans

lender.name: Bernard
lender.occupational_info: My company is responsible for shipping high performance parts for street racers and track enthusiasts who believe in staying ahead of the pack. We supply everything from air intake and exhaust upgrades to racing block engines with swift and easy delivery.

lender.name: lam
lender.loan_because: buy a boat
lender.occupational_info: selling a rice

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed throughout my life with a wonderful, supportive family and a strong circle of friends. This has afforded me great opportunities with respect to education, buying a home & gaining employment. I want others to have the same support and opportunity that I have been given throughout my life. It's important to give to those that are in need. Moreover, the act of giving is such a good feeling...better than any gift I could ever receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a commercial cleaning company.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur and know the rewards of my hard work in creating my own business. I want everyone to feel those rewards of being responsible for their own success.
lender.occupational_info: I help hotels with their pricing so they make money.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I have no reason at all not to.
lender.occupational_info: I work in ICT for a New Zealand Crown Entity

lender.name: Steve and Misha
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand and this is a great way of doing it!
lender.occupational_info: The unglamorous, yet exciting job of putting the news on the air.

lender.name: don mark & lisbeth
lender.loan_because: "Mitakuye Oyasin "(Lakota) - "We are all relatives."
lender.occupational_info: Lisbeth works for a company which provides housing and support for people with developmental disabilities. Mark is an electrician and Blue Water Vietnam Veteran who also volunteers at the local food shelf.

lender.name: Claudio
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in attempting to improve their daily existence and that of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for coordinating the undertaking of construction maintenance projects between the service providers/contractors and the school board district that I represent.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is one way to give to those I dont know in the world, because maybe one day I will be the one needing help as well. I wish everyone good fortune in their endeavors.

lender.name: Chatterjee Family
lender.loan_because: We believe, and the world is a very small place - we all need to do what we can to make it better for each other.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: why not loan? When you think about what we spend and consume as americans, you can't help but feel compelled to "give up" something in order to help others who really need a start.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to have great lives and careers.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want others who are not as fortunate, to realize there dreams and provide for their families. We are all on this earth to help one another, and not fight against each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Gastroenterology Group. These Doctors help people with stomach issues. My job is to bill insurances and follow-up on payments for the Doctors. Sometimes stressful and sometimes rewarding.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have been a small businessman all my life. Business has been very good to me. I want people from all around the world to reap the benefits of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I cook and sell barbequed pork, chicken, and ribs. I have a trailer that I pull to fairs and festivals, where I sell my food.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I'm one of the lucky ones.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: My son and myself feel fortunate to live in a country where all our basic needs have been met. We want to show our gratitude.
lender.occupational_info: I paint vivid landscapes and sculpt passionate sculpture.

lender.name: Garrigan Family
lender.loan_because: We should.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the opportunity to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I research point of care diagnositc devices to aid in disease detection in developing countries.

lender.name: shunmugam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.I've seen hundreds in that position.
lender.occupational_info: I study general subjects .my goal is to become a dentist.

lender.name: Ryuichi
lender.loan_because: I think that a chance should be equally given to all people. The compensation to work should be equal to all people.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I to had to get a loan to start my business, 22 years ago. I had to co-sign with my husband, due to my lack of credit. Now I'm a successful business women.
lender.occupational_info: I teach skin care and glamour, with the wonderful Mary Kay products. When you have taught a women how to but on a beautiful face, she feels prettier and it raises her self confidence.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: It is important for all people to have a chance to succeed. I know what it is like to struggle and feel blessed to be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Computer/Technology Consultant

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: i start a compancy with no nomey and was able to get a loan. this is my 5 years

lender.name: Jill and Gabe
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to see that other entrepreneurs are given the opportunites that we have always been so fortunate to have.
lender.occupational_info: We are a husband and wife team. We own and manage several companies including a real estate company that builds homes, a restaurant and a bar and a start-up consumer products company.

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to give the best of what I have to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Worship Pastor at a church that is focused on serving those in need.

lender.name: PRISCILLA
lender.loan_because: TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONE'S LIFE. I BELIEVE WE ARE PUT ON THIS EARTH TO HELP EACH OTHER. I AM BLESSED TO BE IN A POSITION TO HELP SOMEONE.....*TOGETHER WE CAN ALL MAKE A DIFFERENCE*

lender.name: Kamran Khosravi
lender.loan_because: I enjoy contributing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I help others to be successful in their business or what ever they are up to in life.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: it's both the least and most I can do with the gifts I've received. It's practicing the sacred tangibly.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find ways to help people in pain be more comfortable and happier in how they live.

lender.name: Natalie & Rob
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org provides a way in which you can have a personal connection and have a direct impact on someone's life, rather than give money to an organization and hope the funds are put to good use. And because we can, and if everyone that could help did help, the world would truly be a different and better place!
lender.occupational_info: Natalie - I work at an outdoor theatre in Los Angeles and help put on around 60 concerts per year. Rob - I design and build websites.

lender.name: Jeanie
lender.loan_because: One of the joys of life is to help others realize their dreams. Many people have helped me in my life and so I am glad to pass the kindness along.

lender.name: Chip
lender.loan_because: the policies of the republican party have degraded the world's economies. We must correct this if for only $25 at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find financing to purchase a home of their own. Business has been difficult but we still want to help others.

lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: I really like the Kiva-idea. I have the money and Kiva has the people who needs it. And not just for food and shelter - no it's to raise the whole circle of life and help these people in need to start a business. It's really rewarding.

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: There have been many times in my life where I have needed help and someone was always there. Life is "paying it forward..."

lender.name: Nick and Jen
lender.loan_because: We are a small business as well. We know what it is like to need help, and know what it is like to get it. We would love to be able to help out as well.
lender.occupational_info: We are both photographers. And although our business may be in a very competitive field, we are able to be successful at doing something we both truly love. We want to help others feel the same way.

lender.name: www.rap4.com
lender.loan_because: I want to help and to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Real Action Paintball, Inc.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: People caring for and helping other people will make for a better world. People need to start thinking about others, and not just themselves. Do unto others what you would like done unto you.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business called EXPRESS DELIVERY, and what I do is deliver furniture for people who buy at the stores which I have arangememts with to do their deliveries. Not every customer needs or wants delivery, but a lot do and it is convienient for them when they cannot bring the furniture home themselves. I operate just one truck and do the moving myself with one other person.

lender.name: Doug B
lender.loan_because: I wasted hundreds of dollars "donating" money to a church (LDS, Mormon). So many better options to give money. I urge everyone to stop giving to their church as well.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i help patients and their families cope with terminal illness.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Making the world a better place is something we're going to have to take into our own hands.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent in Southern California.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Canadian living in Mexico..

lender.name: Cherri
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business owners succeed since that is who I primarily work with through my business (SNAP).
lender.occupational_info: I help market small businesses through social networking, advertising and promotion.

lender.name: Clay and Emily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so that we can be a blessing to others
lender.occupational_info: Clay is the principal of a school and Emily is a teacher and a writer.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I think, giving people the "seed finance" (or expansion finance) to develop their own life-base and financing their own financial sources is something most essential to support - it¬¥s surely better to help people getting a machine or other source for their personal financial existance than just feeding! Plus: "just a loan" (not a gift in categories of "alm") allows people to keep their face and pride Plus: I appreciate the direct relation, to see, that the money reaches the people, and is not withdrawn by administratives as often...
lender.occupational_info: Yacht charter rental agent for pleasure boats and create webmarketing strategies for small businesses

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am a fourth generation woman business owner. I understand the plight of women who need to provide for their families as my great grandmother, grandmother and mother have done in their homeland. I as a fourth generation business owner would like to hep support business owners achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I own an online retail store that sells fashion designerwear, fragrances, jewelry, home decor, computer and electronics.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I always look for ways to give financially that can truly make a long term difference. The only way to true wealth is through entrepreneural enterprise. To encourage young entrepreneurs is to sow the seeds for generational wealth. It is the only real way to effectively bring an end to poverty.

lender.name: Gillian
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone in the world deserves an opportunity to be a success in this life. I've been given an amazing opportunity in my own life and want to put that kindness back into the world. On February 24th 2008 my close friend and room mate left this world in a tragic accident. Her giving and loving spirit is what she will always be remembered for. So now I donate in her name so that she will always be remembered for the amazing person she was, and today in spirit she is still saving lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single parent, raising my four year old with out a father, is still much of a social taboo. I work in a hospital in the valley as an Ultrasound technologist. I see patients 5 days a week and use an incredible imaging tool to view peoples organs and vessels to check for disease and of course the obvious... babies ;) everyone's favorite.

lender.name: judy
lender.loan_because: because I know how hard it is not to have the money to make a business work......
lender.occupational_info: I am a hairdresser....

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: "...heal the world, make it a better place..." Michael Jackson

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life who really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I help rehabilitate cardiac patients after surgery. I also teach martial arts and self defense to kids and adults.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand the poverty in developing nations and there is no better way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Managed Futures, International Finance, Alternative Investments, hedge Fund consulting, private capital

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: Although I, too, struggle, I have many blessings that others do not. My focus is on Uganda having travelled there for three weeks in August 2007. I've never been so touched by such kind, friendly, and polite people with the biggest smiles in the whole wide word. Although they don't have much, they don't complain and so I want to be a part of making their lives just a little bit better and providing them with a future. I was impressed by the country, the wildlife, the people, and the children who would occasionally ask for a mere pencil. Imagine American kids appreciating a pencil?!
lender.occupational_info: The job that almost pays the bills is for a private bank in Boston supporting one of its Partners; but I also volunteer at the Boston zoo as a zookeeper and am passionate about gorillas -- we have 7. It was a thrill to sit amongst wild Mt. Gorillas in Bwindi; and I was also touched by my 18 year old porter who I've stayed in touch with and also sponsored his college education. Hopefully on my return trip, he will be my Driver/Guide as he's studying Tourism.

lender.name: John Elton
lender.loan_because: By the Grace of God I am able to loan, and I like to see people make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: This funding fosters self-sufficiency enabling people to provide for themselves, their families, and communities. I would like to some day own my own pharmacy, but I also have funding difficulties.
lender.occupational_info: I work in under served communities, in small independent pharmacies.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a small internet retail business.
